briefTitle: A Study of (LY3650150) Lebrikizumab to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Adult and Adolescent Participants With Moderate-to-Severe Atopic Dermatitis and Skin of Color
officialTitle: An Open-Label, 24-Week Study to Investigate the Safety and Efficacy of Lebrikizumab in Adult and Adolescent Participants With Moderate-to-Severe Atopic Dermatitis and Skin of Color
summary: The main purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy lebrikizumab in adolescent and adult participants with moderate-to-severe atopic dermatitis (AD) and skin of color.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Eczema Area and Severity Index 75 (â‰¥75% Reduction From Baseline in EASI) at Week 16
